title: (x) MTV website font - FS Lola {Yves}
content:
I would like to know which font is used on the picture below, it's a snapshot from the dutch MTV website. It looks like a very popular font from Emigre or DTL, that would be my first guess. Anyone able to help me out with this? Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120118201646im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mtv.gif)
author: wdeboer

comments.content: If you're wondering how I know this one, read the upcoming [Bald Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20120118201646/http:/typographer.org/). ;^)
Nice! Thanks! Ain't cheap ;-) No eastern present for me.
